caption: When saving money turns into a fragrant disaster! ðŸ’¸ðŸ¤£ #TMKOC

reelIdea.english: Jethalal excitedly buys a bulk order of soap from Sodhi's shop to save money. But oops! He mixes the expensive perfume soap with regular laundry soap! The whole society starts smelling like a fancy perfume shop. Jethalal panics and tries to convince everyone it's a new 'luxury scent' trend, while Bhide is shouting for maintenance complaints, and Daya is crying over the â€˜sudden changeâ€™! Taarak Mehta calmly suggests to Jethalal that sometimes, you just have to roll with the fragrances!
reelIdea.hindi: Jethalal khushi se Sodhi ke dukaan se bulk mein sabun kharidta hai paisa bachane ke liye. Lekin oh no! Usne mehngi perfume waale sabun ko aam laundry sabun ke saath mila diya! Pura society ek fancy perfume ki tarah mehakne lagta hai. Jethalal ghabrahat mein hai aur sabko samjhane ki koshish karta hai ki yeh naya 'luxury scent' trend hai, jabki Bhide maintenance ki shikayatein kar rahe hain, aur Daya 'achanak badalav' par ro rahi hai! Taarak Mehta shant se Jethalal se keh rahe hain ki kabhi-kabhi, bas khushboo ke saath chalna padta hai!
